name: Killer Piller
overview: Caterpillars EVERYWHERE!!! Your beautiful orchard is infested with the leaf munching little beasties and they're rapidly devouring everything in sight. Armed with just your super-lethal bug sprayer, can you possibly wipe them out before tehy gobble up all of your trees? maybe so, .. BUT BEWARE... these caterpillars lay eggs that hatch into devious killer moths and they'll be after YOU!
